abstract: Orbital metastasis as initial presentation of adenocarcinoma of lung is an extremely rare phenomenon. Here, we report a 46-year-old non-smoker Asian woman, who presented with right eye proptosis due to right orbital and infratemporal fossa metastasis, as the first presentation of adenocarcinoma of right lung.
title: Orbital and infratemporal fossa metastasis: An unusual initial presentation of adenocarcinoma of lung.
